## AbstractDevice.createTexture2DArray() method

Creates a 2d array texture

**Signature:**

```typescript
createTexture2DArray(format: TextureFormat, width: number, height: number, depth: number, options?: TextureCreationOptions): Texture2DArray;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  format | [TextureFormat](doc/markdown/./device.textureformat.md) | The texture format |
|  width | number | Pixel width of the texture |
|  height | number | Pixel height of the texture |
|  depth | number | Array length of the texture |
|  options | [TextureCreationOptions](doc/markdown/./device.texturecreationoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ The creation options |

**Returns:**

[Texture2DArray](doc/markdown/./device.texture2darray.md)
